data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Apure that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Apure, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Apure, Venezuela to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Apure, Venezuela know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Apure, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Cuiba people. 2.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Apure, Venezuela. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Apure, Venezuela into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Apure that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
